channel.title: docker on Unpro BUG
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Unpro BUG

item.title: centos8 安装docker
item.description: 1. 前置条件 准备一台centos 8 的机器, 我这里用的是vagrant安装的centos8镜像 2. 安装过程 //测试是否链接外网 [vagrant@localhost ~]$ ping google.com PING google.com (216.58.211.14) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from muc03s13-in-f14.1e100.net (216.58.211.14): icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=11.5 ms 64 bytes from muc03s13-in-f14.1e100.net (216.58.211.14): icmp_seq=2 ttl=63 time=12.1 ms ^C --- google.com ping statistics --- 2 packets transmitted, 2 received, 0% packet loss, time 2ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 11.476/11.781/12.086/0.305 ms //删除旧的docker [vagrant@localhost ~]$ sudo yum remove docker \ > docker-client \ > docker-client-latest \ > docker-common \ > docker-latest \ > docker-latest-logrotate \ > docker-logrotate \ > docker-engine No match for argument: docker No match for argument: docker-client No match for argument: docker-client-latest No match for argument: docker-common No match for argument: docker-latest No match for argument: docker-latest-logrotate No match for argument: docker-logrotate No match for argument: docker-engine No packages marked for removal.
